heading: HB06959
0: AN ACT RESTRUCTURING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL RAILWAY SYSTEM, CREATING THE PHILIPPINE RAILWAY AUTHORITY, THE PHILIPPINE RAILWAY CORPORATIONS, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06959
FULL TITLE : AN ACT RESTRUCTURING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL RAILWAY SYSTEM, CREATING THE PHILIPPINE RAILWAY AUTHORITY, THE PHILIPPINE RAILWAY CORPORATIONS, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SY-ALVARADO, JOSE ANTONIO "KUYA JONATHAN" R.
DATE FILED : 2018-01-15
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Uybarreta (000 2018-07-31)2. Salceda (000 2018-09-06)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-01-31
          -A TWG was created,to be chaired by Rep. Mark Go, to consolidated all measures (19) proposing to amend the PNR, create Mindanao Railways and other rail-related measures
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-02-14
          -1st TWG meeting. Secretariat to consolidated the 19 bills and forward substitute bill to the Committees on Appropriations and Ways and Means for comments
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2018-03-14
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON TRANSPORTATION, LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISES
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION on 2018-01-17;SECONDARILY REFERRED TO TRANSPORTATION on 2018-01-17;
